sentence.text: We identified a homozygous missense mutation, c.1308 G-A (p.V421M) in FOXRED1 in a patient who presented with epilepsy and severe psychomotor retardation.

A patient myoblast line showed a severe reduction in complex I, associated with the accumulation of subassemblies centered around a340 kDa, and a milder decrease in complex II, all of which were rescued by retroviral expression of wild-type FOXRED1.
